title: THE BRIEF
list: Burapha Agroforestry (BAFCO) is a leader in the timber industry that had spearheaded a revolution in the Laotian forestry sector.
BAFCO’s workflows spanned from manufacturing to merchandising. Niteco faced a dual challenge in order to ensure efficiency at every stage of their workflow.

title: THE SOLUTION
content: We designed a solution to power collaboration within the organization, and control system information. Niteco developed a fully functioning intranet portal and reconfigured the whole mailbox system.

title: TECHNICAL DETAILS
list: We designed a solution to power collaboration within the organization, and control system information.
Used Microsoft® Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, and OneDrive.
We transferred all 67 mailboxes to Microsoft® Exchange Online.
